Headless and PWA websites are particularly valuable for technology companies and those operating in Research and Development (R&D). This is because of the specific nature of these sectors and their exposure to potential external threats. With the right approach, the adoption of new web technologies will have a positive impact on, among other things:
Reducing the risk of internal sensitive data loss
Improving website accessibility even with a weak connection or in offline mode
Independence of work between frontend and backend teams on the website
Enhancing performance and efficiency, even for highly complex websites
Easy integration with internal systems using modern tools and libraries.
Consistent performance across various devices, especially mobile

Website administration is a time-consuming task - including updates, responding to failures and development work. What if you had an experienced team that would take over your responsibilities, advise on UX and IT and complete the work faster?

Technical support means, above all, saving the time you spend on running a website, but also security and freedom in planning development. In the event of a failure, you do not have to waste valuable time looking for help, and whenever the need for development arises, you have an experienced team of designers and programmers at hand who will be happy to implement your plans.

What do you gain by entrusting us with
You don't have to look for help from the IT team every time risking the quality of execution, you have a proven and experienced team always at hand.

Thanks to constant support, you can plan your work in advance. Do you need a landing page for a campaign? Or maybe you are considering a new functionality? You have a team that will complete the work on your schedule.

We work in a test environment

We provide an individual HelpDesk system

We constantly monitor the performance of the website
After the end of each month, we send a report with a summary of work, including a list of tasks performed during the month, the level of implementation and a summary of hours worked/task.
Every month we report on hours worked

In the subscription model, we establish a package of hours that you can use each month for the work of specialists (designers and programmers). The number of hours in the package is selected individually based on your needs and website development plans.
You don't have to worry about our availability, you can freely plan your work on the website. Regardless of our workload, a package of hours is guaranteed every month.
If you have smaller needs and do not plan constant monthly work on the website, we understand that. In the flexible model, we carry out work on an order basis, each time setting a completion date.
You only pay when you need our support, you can count on our advice and support in the event of a failure, and at the same time you avoid fixed costs.
Regardless of the cooperation model you choose, you will receive access to our reporting system using the JIRA tool.

Thanks to HelpDesk, you can add tasks, set priorities, view work status and communicate with the IT team - all at hand in one place. At the end of the month, we prepare a report on the work performed, which includes the time and estimation of each task.
User-centered design of websites, e-commerce & apps.
We design websites and online stores
We design to make using websites

UX/UI design is a way of designing, among others websites, which requires close collaboration between the design team, developers, users and the business. It involves many activities in the area of user experience (UX) and user interface (UI), on the way to creating websites that not only look great but are also easy to use, engage users and effective in achieving business goals.
We love challenges and problem solving, we specialize in designing interfaces for the Internet, focusing not only on appearance but also on practical use and functionality. We would love to design:
Are you looking for an experienced
The appearance and functionality of your website are crucial - within the first few seconds of visiting a website, users decide whether they will stay there. Thanks to UX/UI you will influence
among others thanks to the refined information architecture and visual layer users will be inclined to come back to your website and stay longer
regardless of whether you sell products or run a website, a properly designed interface will help you achieve the goals you set for your website.
thanks to intuitive handling and appropriate navigation paths, user can easily finds the information he needs and you increase the chances of selling your product or service
extensive knowledge of technology allows you to design the interface taking into account its limitations, while maintaining the functionality and ease of use of the website
building an attractive appearance based on existing visual identification will make your website remembered for longer and associated only with your company
Designing website interfaces may seem complicated, when you contract us to design your website you can expect us to follow an iterative process:

Discovery phase, i.e. collecting requirements - in the first step, we invite you to an conversation during which we get to know all the requirements of the project, your company and users of the future website, store or application.

Analysis of the received information - during this stage we organize the received data. We analyze the provided requirements and ideas, then begin work designing user persona, site map and user flow, among other things.
Creating a product concept - in the next step, we design the information architecture, sketch the first views, ending with UX mockups (prototype/site skeleton).
At this stage, we check if the prototype fulfills the goals and requirements and whether it fits the users needs, then we make fixes and verify it again.
Based on the accepted prototype, we design the graphic design of the website/store relying on the visual branding and current trends.

After passing the design process, its time for implementation and product development - at this stage we implement the best developed solution in order to further improve it, while confronting the market.
What do we deliver as part of the
Defines the emotions experienced by users while interacting with the interface. Thanks to proper use, we can identify areas requiring improvement on our website, store or application.
This is a diagram defining the path that user must follow on the website in order to complete a task e.g. purchasing a product in an online store
This is a collection of guidelines and standard elements (e.g. different versions of buttons, windows and components) that can be used when designing new subpages in the future.
Information architecture is responsible for organizing and dividing the content on the website to facilitate the user's search for the necessary materials.

It is a graphical presentation of the arrangement elements on a page, that allows to determine the function, type of content (including graphics, heading, paragraph or button) and the way the user interacts with the page.
It is a visual presentation of the final appearance of the website, designed with emphasis on consistency with the company's visual identification, aesthetics and the nature of the business.
Dedicated to special needs for your business.
Beautifully designed websites, ensuring high performance, code quality, and security..
We create tailored websites, designing an individual look for you and coding from scratch.

We don't use templates or ready-made solutions. We implement websites from scratch, using only proven and modern technologies, as well as clear technological processes. This allows us to ensure the highest quality, performance, and security.
From the UX/UI design of the website, through backend and frontend development, to post-launch support, we provide services at every stage of the product life.

When creating websites, we focus on

We always rely on the technical documentation of the solutions we use. Thanks to this, we ensure the correct operation of the implemented functions and the speed of the website, without unnecessary code.

In interface design, your requirements and user needs are crucial to us. We design elements such as information architecture, website prototypes, and a brand-aligned design to ensure a user-friendly and eye-pleasing website.
Scalability which is preparing for growth.
The goal of running a business is its development. We prioritize long-term solutions by implementing, among other things modern architecture and a system designed for further expansion.
Webo is a team of real-life programmers, we do not use poor-quality ready-made products. We program websites from scratch, ensuring high quality, speed and efficiency.
Stable website operation over the years.

Our task is to provide a stable website. This is an investment that is intended to ensure that you achieve your business goals without worrying about the performance or availability of the website for potential customers.
We carry out detailed quality and functioning checks of the website. We perform tests on various devices and screen resolutions to make sure everything works properly before publication.
Which directly affects positioning in Google results, as well as user experience - the bounce rate increases by 90% when the page loads in more than 3 seconds

Good-quality code and compliance with the documentation ensure that further expansion will not cause complications and will shorten the time the developer needs to implement new subpages or functions.
Stable operation even for many years
Qualitative implementation means certainty of the website's operation, among others: no performance issues or errors blocking opening and maximizing data security.

Creating a modern website requires a wide range of technical knowledge and user-centric design, as well as a well-established process that ensures the achievement of goals without time delays and within the agreed budget.
This is the first step we need to take in order to create a website. During our initial conversation, we thoroughly understand your needs and project requirements.
We select the best technology and solutions tailored to your project
We prepare a cost estimate, which includes a detailed implementation method and technology stack
We determine the project duration and delivery deadlines
After the cost estimate, proposed solutions, and deadlines are approved, we sign a cooperation agreement and move on to implementation.

During this stage, we work on the appearance of the website. We start by analyzing the habits of the target audience (your customers) and the market environment - all to ensure that users can easily navigate the new site. Then, we create mood boards (inspiration boards), outline user flows, design UX layouts, and finish with the final look of your website.
You will have insight into every stage of the design work and direct contact with an experienced UX/UI designer.
You will approve each stage of your website project - from moodboards to the final look.
Once the final look is approved, the project is ready for the programming stage

After approving the interface design, we begin work on the comprehensive implementation of the website in the selected technology. We work from the configuration of the technical infrastructure, through the installation of the required tools to the programming of the site.
You will have a live preview of the site in the development environment, which will give you full control over the project
We will configure the technical infrastructure needed for the efficient operation of the website
We will develop the website with all the required features and integrations e.g. GA4.
Once the programming stage is complete, we submit the website for QA.

In this stage, we thoroughly check the performance of the website. We perform tests on multiple devices and screen resolutions (from the smallest smartphones to FHD displays), all to make sure that everything works as expected. After passing the internal tests, we pass the website to the client for verification - this is the moment to refine the design and make any comments before publication.
We check the performance of each function, the performance of the site, infrastructure configurations and the display of the site on multiple devices
We forward the site to the client for review, make any corrections to prepare the site for publication.
After receiving the green light for publication from the client, we will kick off!

Publication of the site is often only the beginning, and during the use of the site there are ideas for new features, tabs or improvements - at this point we can also not forget about necessary updates or monitoring of performance, security or stability of work.

5G Made Together - Headless website for an international technology conference
5G Made Together is an association and conference held several times a year, addressing topics related to digital transformation, technology, cybersecurity, business, and science.
, involving the cooperation of various partners to build open telecommunications networks and democratize the telecommunications market.

The 5G Made Together initiative is organized by IS-Wireless, which provides private 5G networks in an open model (Open RAN). IS-Wireless is based in Poland and carries out projects with partners in Europe and Southeast Asia.

In every project, the most crucial aspect is the

. The basis for the designed website was the information architecture and UX wireframes. We created a prototype design for the target service, including the homepage, a library of upcoming and past events, a conference page, and an organizer's page.
According to the given requirement, the conference website was initially supposed to function as a
. UX wireframes for other subpages were prepared for future use.
After completing the UX wireframes, we started the
(graphic design of the website). Conference websites are usually schematic - our goal was to break away from the norm and
that would relate to new technologies and the client's sector.

To achieve this, we opted for sharp shapes broken by rounded buttons, applied a blue color scheme with a distinctive shade of blue as the main color, and used graphics of radio waves, which refer to the conference organizer's sector. Implementing these ideas guaranteed us a standout website.

Eurostal - dynamic 3D configurator for a Polish manufacturer of sheet metal garages

The Eurostal configurator enables full customization of sheet metal garages for customers from many countries. The implemented solution allows you to dynamically generate a 3D model of the garage based on the options selected by the user.
Eurostal - dynamiczny konfigurator 3D dla polskiego producenta garay blaszanych

Konfigurator Eurostal umoliwia pene dostosowanie garay blaszanych dla klientw z wielu krajw. Wdroone rozwizanie pozwala dynamicznie generowa model 3D garau na podstawie opcji wybranych przez uytkownika.

dziaa na rynku od 2009 roku. Dziki wieloletniemu dowiadczeniu i wykwalifikowanej kadrze sta si liderem w produkcji lekkich konstrukcji stalowych. W ofercie Eurostal znajduj si garae blaszane, hale, magazyny, domki narzdziowe i ogrodowe, wiaty na mieci i drewno, kojce dla psw oraz rne, nawet najbardziej skomplikowane, nietypowe konstrukcje realizowane zawsze z myl o spenieniu kolejnej potrzeby klienta..
Swoj dziaania prowadzi gwnie poza granicami Polski (m.in. w Czechach, Sowacji na Wgrzech, w Rumunii oraz na terenie Niemiec i Woch) gdzie zyska uznanie tysicy klientw.

Przed wdroeniem kofniguratora, uytkownik mia moliwo dokonania zamwienia tylko z dostpnej oferty produktowej. Stworzenie garau na wymiar wymagao bezporedniego kontaktu i omawiania szczegw podczas rozmowy z handlowcem.

Zlecenie zgoszone przez klienta polegao na przygotowaniu konfiguratora 3D garay, ktry usprawni i skrci proces sprzedaowy. Stworzenie konfiguratora miao na celu umoliwienie uytkownikom swobodnego zaprojektowania swojego garau, skracajc tym samym czas pracy handlowcw jaki musieli powica na ustalanie szczegw konstrukcji.
Wdroenie silnika konfiguratora z wykorzystaniem biblioteki ThreeJS
Wdroenie pl wyboru zgodnie z przygotowanym projektem
Poczenie rozwizania Frontend z silnikiem konfiguratora

Podczas pracy nad konfiguratorem, musielimy zwrci szczegln uwag na aspekt techniczny produkowanych przed klienta garay. Wymiar konstrukcji uzaleniony jest od wielu elementw, ktre do swoich potrzeb moe dostosowa uytkownik. Prcz aspektw technicznych bardzo wane byo umoliwienie podgldu garau w trybie rzeczywistym.

Wszystkie parametry garau musz by spjne ze specyfikacj techniczn tak aby skonfigurowany gara by zgodny z rzeczywistymi moliwociami produkcji. M.in. wysoko garau uzaleniona jest od wysokoci wybranej bramy, rodzaj dachu i wysokoci garau wpywa na moliwo osadzenia drzwi, a stopie nachylenia dachu uzaleniony jest od szerokoci. Wszystkie zalenoci obliczane s na podstawie danych technicznych przekazanych przez klienta.

Jednym z gwnych zaoe bya moliwo swobodnego ogldania garau. Wymagao to stworzenia widoku 3D, dziki ktremu uytkownik moe obraca gara w dowolnym kierunu oraz przyblia / oddala widok za pomoc scrollowania. Zmiany w modelu generowane s automatycznie po wybraniu opcji prze uytkownika, bez koniecznoci przeadowania strony.

Konfigurujc swj gara uytkownik ma moliwo ustawienia wysokoci i szerokoci bramy oraz dostosowania jej pooenia w poziomie. Jako opcja dostpne s take drzwi i okna ktre mona swobodnie przesuwa w 2 paszczyznach. Prcz tego uytkownik moe wybra rodzaj konstrukcji, kolor poszycia oraz dobra akcesoria np. system alarmowy.

System konfguratora umoliwia rozbudow o automatyczne obliczanie ceny, na bazie wybranych przez uytkownika parametrw, opcji i akcesoriw. Na ten moment, zgodnie z decyzj klienta, funkcjonalno jest wyczona.

Z racji na to e sklep internetowy Eurostal zbudowany jest na platformie WooCommerce, musielimy zapewni poprawno dziaania wanie w tym systemie. Wdroone rozwizanie musiao umoliwi edycj parametrw konfiguratora z poziomu panelu administracyjnego Wordpress.

Bardzo dua ilo moliwych konfiguracji garau uniemoliwiaa skorzystanie z prostych form wizualizacji np. wgrania zdj rnych wersji garau. Silnik konfiguratora Eurostal zbudowany zosta z wykorzystaniem biblioteki ThreeJS, ktra rysuje model 3D wykonujc algorytm obliczajcy wsprzdne. Oznacza to ze konfigurator nie potrzebuje wgrania gotowych zdj / renderw produktu - model 3D generowany jest w czasie rzeczywistym.
Ostatnim etapem prac byo wykonanie optymalizacji zdj ktre przypieszyo czas adowania, dodanie prostego formularza kontaktowego oraz publikacja konfiguratora na kilku sklepach klienta.

W efekcie prac nasz klient otrzyma gotowy konfigurator produktu ktry moe by dowolnie rozbudowywany, zarwno o funkcje sprzedaowe, jak i konstrukcyjne wpywajce na wygld i specyfik sprzedawanych garay - zastosowana technologia nie stawia ogranicze.

ORAVIO - E-commerce UX/UI design for the premium-grade sonic toothbrush manufacturer
Oravio is a Polish manufacturer of high-quality sonic toothbrushes. Our task was to design a user-friendly interface that highlights the key product features.
UX/UI Sklepu internetowego producenta szczoteczek sonicznych klasy premium
to to polski producent wysokiej jakoci szczoteczek sonicznych. Naszym zadaniem byo zaprojektowanie

Firma Oravio produkuje wysokiej klasy, stylowe i niezwykle eleganckie szczoteczeki soniczne, wykorzystywane do higieny jamy ustnej zarwno na co dzie, w podry jak i podczas leczenia ortodontycznego. Dziki duemu zrnicowaniu oferty, Oravio dociera do szerokiego grona odbiorcw, dbajc nie tylko o piekny umiech ale przede wszystkim o zdrowie swoich klientw.
